divs: Sighting DetailsMany orbs moved around each other in an unorganized manor in the early night sky. 3 met in the shape of a triangle and the triangle expanded as they traveled together. The orbs eventually got dimmer and faded.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Duluth
There were no other sightings in Duluth on or around August 10th 2013
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Close to 10 orbs moving around in the night sky.
